Data Fields
CSR_MESH_NETID_LIST_T Struct Reference
CSRmesh&trade; » Core Stack

CSR Mesh Network Id List.

Data Fields

CsrUint8 length
 List of existing mesh network IDs. Each octet value identifies one distinguished mesh network. This is defined as a flexible array and a field of this type will be part of union CSR_MESH_APP_CB_DATA_T. The array netIdList will have maximum number of array elements i.e. allowed by the maximum size of the union. An invalid network id is defined as 0xFF. More...
 
CsrUint8 netIDList [CSR_MESH_MAX_NO_OF_NWKS]
 list of Net-ids
 

Field Documentation

CsrUint8 length

<length of netid list
